fields.description:

	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.vector.VectorizedBatchUtil.createColumnVector(VectorizedBatchUtil.java:172)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.ReduceRecordSource.init(ReduceRecordSource.java:177)

{noformat}

Steps to reproduce the issue:
{noformat}
set hive.vectorized.execution.enabled=true;
set hive.support.concurrency=true;
set hive.txn.manager=org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.lockmgr.DbTxnManager;

drop table if exists newtable;
create external table newtable(
            a string,
            b int,
            c double)
row format delimited
fields terminated by '\t'
stored as textfile;

drop table if exists newtable_acid;
create table newtable_acid (b int, a varchar(50),c decimal(3,2), d int)
clustered by (b) into 2 buckets
stored as orc
tblproperties ('transactional'='true');

insert into newtable_acid(a,b,c)
select * from newtable;

select a, b, c from newtable_acid;
{noformat}

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Vectorization is not supported for datatype:VOID error while inserting data into specific columns
